thing-type.label: ST815 Illumination Sensor
thing-type.description: Illumination Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Illumination Sensor is designed to monitor the current illumination of ambient environment. The reading of illumination can be reported to you on a regular base at your disposal. If illumination reaches set points, the sensor will send alerts to associated devices for further execution (such as trigger on connected lightings). The Illumination Sensor is suitable for use in darkness and outdoor. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing ESC key 3 times within 1.5 seconds will enter inclusion mode. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPressing ESC key 3 times within 1.5 seconds will enter exclusion mode. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtNot Provided</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set Level
parameter.description: Basic Set Level<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtSet basic set value to be on or off.</p&gt <p&gtSet to 0 to disable</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Lux Trigger On Value
parameter.description: Lux Trigger On Value<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtLux level when ON command is sent out.</p&gt <p&gtSet to 0 to disable.</p&gt <p&gtValid values - 30-1000 or 0</p&gt <p&gtDefault 30</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Lux Trigger Off Value
parameter.description: Lux Trigger Off Value<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtLux level when Off command is sent out.</p&gt <p&gtValues 30-1000 or 0</p&gt <p&gtDefault 500</p&gt <p&gtSet to 0 to disable.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_2
parameter.label: 4: Lux Trigger Off Timer Value.
parameter.description: Lux Trigger Off Timer Value.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTimer value in minutes.</p&gt <p&gtValues : 1-480 or 0</p&gt <p&gtDefault 240</p&gt <p&gtSet to 0 to disable.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_2
parameter.label: 5: Auto Report Time Interval
parameter.description: Auto Report Time Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime interval in minutes to auto report to association group 1</p&gt <p&gtValid values 1-1439 minutes or 0</p&gt <p&gtSet to 0 to Disable</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_2
parameter.label: 6: Auto Report Lux Interval
parameter.description: Auto Report Lux Interval<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtLux interval step size to auto report to association group 1</p&gt <p&gtValid Values 30-1000 (Lux)</p&gt <p&gtSet to 0 to Disable</p&gt</p&gt
